title: My valley is changing
creator_contributor_role: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Bougainville (Papua New Guinea)

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Papua New Guinea - Social conditions
description: Shows how the people of Bougainvillea are reacting to the changes brought about by the mining operations. They are finding it difficult to adapt but copper export means income for the whole territory and provides jobs and training for people eager for independence.
